title: The Realest Shit You Ever Heard
description: A simple guide is all we need to move life onto a better path. Written for the person I was a few years ago when I felt like everything was shitty and nothing would ever get better. Perhaps you can relate."This book isn't about any religion or philosophy or magic. This book isn't trying to sell you anything or make you join a cult. You can utilize the Realizations regardless of your beliefs." A concise, easy-to-read book about turning a troubled mind and life into a satisfying future.Especially recommended for people new to sobriety and recovery, fresh out of a mental health hospital, re-entering society from incarceration, or looking for a place to start on crafting a satisfied mind. Every big change starts with simple ideas. Here are some that worked for me.
author: Cris Lane
